website_summaries.verdict: The sleek TMA-1 headphones by Aiaiai are ideal for traveling DJs who need tough headphones with an up-front, bass-slamming sound profile.
pros: Aiaiai's full-sized monitoring headphones are suitable for DJs and music lovers alike
They are built to last, with an expandable rubberized wire and a robust, one-piece design
cons: There's no material to cushion the thin rubber headband, which can lead to fatigue after long periods of use

customer_reviews.title: My second TMA-1
customer_reviews.text: Recently I bought my second pair of TMA-1 and I was lucky to find them as my old model was not in good condition as the material made from plastic tends to turn to a sticky rubber as humidity is a great cause of this. This headphones are the best for my home DJ studio setup and when I play at times at a club or bar. I am lucky to find a second pair of these amazing headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M

customer_reviews.title: AIAIAI TMA-1s: Overall, fantastic warm sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones I have really been enjoying. They provide rich, clear, warm sound and look fantastic. The only problems I've had with them are: 1. You really can't move around a lot or they will fall off. Tilt your head back and they WILL fall off. 2. The headband can be a little rough on your head. It's not really padded; it's a solid piece of rubber, but it's not overly painful. You get used to it after a while. Unless either of those really bother you, I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good pair of warm sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Owen

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing DJ headphones.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bedroom / pro / in the mix DJ - these are amazing headphones. I would not recommend these for general listening. They are not EQ'd for enjoyment. They are EQ'd for loud / club / party / real dj experiences where you need to hear the kick drum from a track in this atmosphere. They are perfect for this.. and rugged and tight fit on the ears for proper positioning in the mix. Not a commuter phone, a pro dj phone. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Creative GameLife

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these, but truth is their build quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but truth is their build quality is crap. The headband on my first pair snapped; AIAIAI stated this was a known issue and kindly replaced. I gave up on them when the replacement headset also snapped. Same thing happened to a friend who purchased them. So yes, they look and sound nice, but don't expect them to last.
customer_reviews.author: DanielB

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous Sound
customer_reviews.text: not so "Bassy" as Beats, not so confy actually, but what I really love is the fact that they don't look like a sci fi spaceship on your head, like every other manufacturer designs their headphones. these are SLICK!, and the materials feel good at contact, its really a collectable item. also, AMAZING customer service, my old pair broke from the headband, and they sent me a NEW pair of headphones in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Negrete

customer_reviews.title: Do not last
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these headphones for almost 2 years now. When i first got them I would rate them as 4 stars, but now that i've used them for this long they are not a very good pair of head phones. The bass response is very bad now that they are old, I would not recommend these headphones to anyone who wants something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kbl

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, but where is the three-button in-line remote?
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for on the go DJing where I know they'll be taking a beating. But I was looking forward to also using the three-button In-line remote with a microphone promised in the product description. This was no where within the packaging. Would have gotten a five star if the package description was accurate. For the price I feel a little cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Thayer

customer_reviews.title: TMA-1
customer_reviews.text: the headphones came in a box that wasn't sealed so I wasn't positive they were brand new. no factory warranty either. they sound alright but overpriced, although they are still breaking in. the ear ups are a bit small but overall I love them. crisp clear sound, not enough bass though...maybe after they break in, IF they are indeed brand new.
customer_reviews.author: desert flower

customer_reviews.title: Good but wont last for ever. 2 years max.
customer_reviews.text: They look awesome. They sound is awesome. And they fits great. But, the headband breaks, the cable will start to fail and the right speaker will eventually die. My headband broke after a year, a friends headband lasted a bit longer but also broke, and my cousins right speak started to fail / die after two years. If you want headphones that will last for ever go with something else. If you don't mind changing them after a while these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: They break at around 7 months.  Twice.
customer_reviews.text: These would be great, but I've gone through two pairs. Apparently they break at the uppermost part of the head band at around the 7 month mark. The first pair was replaced for free under warranty, the second is outside of the warranty. I used them for DJing, so there was a lot of taking them on and off. Maybe regular use would allow them to last longer. It's a shame, they sound really good.
customer_reviews.author: VSS

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: One side of the headphone stopped working after a year. I am a DJ and I take care of my gear but I use my headphones a lot. These are touted as also indestructible but I guess that does not include the audio going out of one ear.
customer_reviews.author: PhotovideogoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not great for this price.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds isn't horrible, but it is base heavy. And the headband breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Kochenderfer

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones...take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: As has been mentioned multiple times, they are a bit hard on the top of your head ("that's what she said") and could do with some more padding. They have unbelievable sound though and you get used to the other.
customer_reviews.author: jbeech01

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are fantastic. I have had my pair now for a ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic. I have had my pair now for a few years and they are holding up just fine. Their sound is perfect for most of the music I like, and it has a good "space" to it.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound and comfortable fit. They are lightweight yet sturdy. No tangle cord make them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 star but 4 1/2
customer_reviews.text: wanted to give it 5 star but it's a little uncomfortable on top of the head. no padding on the bar and you feel it a lot. other wise i would give it 5 stars, right now 41/2. the sound is just great after breakin period. the bass is really true and sweetand goes perfectly with the mid and high. if you are listening to live concert, it put you right in the front row and you pop in a good cd and it feels like the person is singing right infront of you. 5 star if they make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: armsimle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Suitable for pro use. Gret balanced sound with a minimalist design. Cable locks in place at the ear cup. One of my favs.
customer_reviews.author: the  mixstress

customer_reviews.title: Finally!...DJ Headphones that sound great and can handle daily use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these "refurbished" from a company in NY. No box or anything, just the headphones and cable; all of that was fully disclosed. Headphones arrived in perfect condition, as described, working perfectly. I have been using these 4 nights a week in a club environment and feel like I have finally found the headphones I'm looking for. LOVE THEM! - DJ Froid
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Audelo

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of cans
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones..have been using them now for a few years & still sound great! These are my gig cans, they've got a nice robust low end so they do the trick. Not ideal for studio production in my opinion but can still get the job done in my productions if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Luigiii

customer_reviews.title: Design and Comfort mixed with Solid Sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is so solid. Build quality is great too. Not to mention these things look minimal and slick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction and Quality sound. Easy fit over the head.
customer_reviews.author: Kishore Raj T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound. The item we delivered quickly. The item was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a heavy base balance. You may not get the full range if you're looking to do mixing with them. Also, they're made of plastic, and broke easily.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Ablan

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Build is solid. Design is very comfortable. Ear piece rests on the ear without pressing up against it. Design and weight allows headphones to be worn for long periods of time. Audio quality is acceptable for the price, but improves dramatically if used along with an equalizer. On the whole, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: i lOVE IT comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: awesome when u use it with trebble BOOST doesnt need an amp but it does sound much better plugged into a sound card
customer_reviews.author: H. lei

customer_reviews.title: All the cons are true :-(
customer_reviews.text: - It has a loose fit, so you cannot actually walk that much with them on. - the rubber peel goes off so the look is less appealing. After some time a rattling sound appeared on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. They have a simple design that accompanies the superb sound quality. Anyone looking for amazing dj quality headphones and don't want to pay 300+ for the big names, look no further, aiaiai are the headphones for you.
customer_reviews.author: WizardWindow

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I've used headphones from cheapie earbuds, to higher-end over/on ear headphones. Well, I got these yesterday and they are easily the best headphones that I have ever heard. Everything sounds just like it should, and they're FUN to listen to. I can't stop using them. They're just incredible. I was on the fence of either getting the Audio-Technica ATH-M50, but I decided on these instead and do not regret my decision at all. If you're looking for a good, comfortable, well-built, and great sounding headphone, this is your answer.
customer_reviews.author: Max P.

customer_reviews.title: awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphones. Love the plain all black look. Sound great. Look great. Not into beats with overpowering base. Great for music production
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Minimal design with hi-fi audio
customer_reviews.text: Loving these headphones for DJing and for general listening use. Comfortable, functional and beautiful. Solid design using quality materials. I can see me using these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S. Igharas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best for live dj gigs, cuts through all the outside frequencies so mixing is all on point.
customer_reviews.author: meggie oliver

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: look great, sound amazing, minimal noise leak. can get uncomfortable after long periods of use, especially while wearing eyeglasses that have thicker arms.
customer_reviews.author: thomas pregiato

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite, and probably good for 4 more years
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for 4 years. Still my favorite, and probably good for 4 more years!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Miro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was a refurbished set it looks , smells , feels brand new
customer_reviews.author: Wikinailz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product with an amazing audio quality (electro/rap). A good alternative to other headphones as Beat and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kruh Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones!
customer_reviews.text: Black, and plastic hard frame. Works great, and looks great as well. Sound is wonderful. I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Isis A. Samuels-swaby

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly loud
customer_reviews.text: An amazing pair of headphones. They have great bass but don't lose the mids and the highs. Though I can only compare them to the pair of sennheiser 25HD's I've had for the last 7 years, I could handle full volume on my computer with the HD25's but I can only handle half volume with the TMA-1's, even so, at full volume the don't distort.
customer_reviews.author: Brieve

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent DJ headphones. Designed by and for DJ's. They rest comfortably on your head and pivot perfectly for your one ear off needs. Would be nice if the ear cups rotated 90 degrees like the Senheiser 280's but I'm getting used to that sacrifice.
customer_reviews.author: King Fader

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE BASS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hot looking headphones...get stares from everyone, even at the gym!!! Incredible bass. Sound great from an Ipod. Bigger than the picture, so if you like small, not for you. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: timtim

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality Headphones, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones as a birthday gift for my son who is an electro/house music deejay on CDJ's. He absolutely loves them and is very happy with the quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Great sound isolation, with superb bass and clarity. Solidly constructed. Comfy and replaceable ear cups. Minimalist aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have gaming headphones and ear buds that cost less, but sound much better than this. Highs are not crisp. Low end is basically non existent. I have no clue what the people giving this product positive reviews are listening to.
customer_reviews.author: There Is No God

product_meta.title: AIAIAI TMA-1 DJ Headphones without Mic, Black
product_meta.description:
Style:without MicPro quality performance with a modern appeal. Proven on stage and in the studio by the world's most demanding DJs, the TMA-1 has been made in collaboration with 25 professional and renowned DJ's (James Murphy, A- Trak, Seth Troxler, Madill, amongst others). Tested in studios and on tours all over the world, this is a specialized piece of equipment for the hard working musician and audiophiles alike.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



AIAIAI TMA-1 DJ HEADPHONE (NO MIC), BLACK
PRO QUALITY PERFORMANCE WITH A MODERN APPEAL. PROVEN ON STAGE AND IN THE STUDIO BY THE WORLD'S MOST DEMANDING DJS, THE TMA-1 HAS BEEN MADE IN COLLABORATION WITH 25 PROFESSIONAL AND RENOWNED DJ'S (JAMES MURPHY, A- TRAK, SETH TROXLER, MADLIB, AMONGST OTHERS). TESTED IN STUDIOS AND ON TOURS ALL OVER THE WORLD, THIS IS A SPECIALIZED PIECE OF EQUIPMENT FOR THE HARD WORKING MUSICIAN AND AUDIOPHILES ALIKE.
 * In the box:
 * 1.5 meter coiled cable
 * 6.3 mm stereo plug converter.
 * 2 sets of earpads (1 leather, 1 synthetic)
 * Heavy duty carrying pouch
 * Booklet

FEATURES
TITANIUM HIGH PERFORMANCE DRIVERS
The TMA-1 offers dynamic 40mm closed titanium drivers for clear and accurate sound in all frequencies. 

CABLE LOCK
You can choose to lock the cable to the TMA-1, to make sure it doesn't get pulled out while playing. 

INTERCHANGEABLE EARPADS
You can easily change the earpads. Choose between regular or noise isolating pads for DJ use. 

ANGLED STEREO PLUG
This makes it harder to accidentally pull the plug from the mixer, and less intrusive, when you are beat mixing. 

PLUG CONVERTER
An extra plug that lets you change from 3.5 mm plug size to the larger 6.3 mm is included. 

ADJUSTABLE CUPS You can easily change the position of the cups to make the headphones fit perfectly. SPECIFICATIONS
Transducer Principle Dynamic, closed
Driver Unit Size 40 mm
Impedance 32±15% Ohm
Load Rating 0.1W
Frequency Response 20 to 20.000 Hz
Total Harmonic Distortion < 0.3%
Sensitivity 103±3dB Weight w/o
Weight without cable 190 Gram SIMILAR PRODUCTS TO CONSIDER
AIAIAI TMA-1 Studio Headphones (No Mic), Black

The TMA-1 Studio is the new addition to the acclaimed TMA-1 DJ headphones from AIAIAI.

AIAIAI TMA-1 Fool's Gold Headphones with Microphone, Black

Brooklyn-based record label Fool's Gold was founded in 2007 by DJs A-Trak and Nick Catch dubs...

Brooklyn-based record label Fool's Gold was founded in 2007 by DJs A-Trak and Nick Catch dubs...
